Participants.evidence: All patients enrolled in the 3 participating centers in the Netherlands were included.

Intervention.evidence: We performed an economic evaluation of DHOPE versus static cold storage (SCS)

Objective.evidence: Our objective was to evaluate the cost-effectiveness of DHOPE in donation after circulatory death (DCD) liver transplantation.

Method_Outcome.evidence: Costs related to the transplant procedure, hospital stay, readmissions, and outpatients treatments up to 1 y posttransplant were calculated.

Number_Randomised.evidence: Of 119 patients, 60 received a liver after DHOPE and 59 received a liver after SCS alone.

Result_Outcome.evidence: The mean total cost per patient up to 1 y posttransplant was €126 221 for the SCS group and €110 794 for the DHOPE group.
